item.title: install node
item.description: https://www.digitalocean.com/community/tutorials/how-to-install-node-js-on-ubuntu-22-04 cd ~/Downloads curl -sL https://deb.nodesource.com/setup_18.x -o nodesource_setup.sh sudo bash nodesource_setup.
